oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dependence with complete connections and the Gauss-Kuzmin theorem for N-continued fractions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lascu, Dan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Number Theory
11J70, 11K50
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We consider a family $\{T_N:N \geq 1 \}$ of interval maps as generalizations of the Gauss transformation. For the continued fraction expansion arising from $T_N$, we solve its Gauss-Kuzmin-type problem by applying the theory of random systems with complete connections by Iosifescu.
